analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0x1a9eb0f43ab4d9ffef9908b4d2c4b7f400ce3b3c.sol:
	Contract BITOToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x1a9eb0f43ab4d9ffef9908b4d2c4b7f400ce3b3c.sol#236-237)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
